alert.note: Alert for Clarendon; Lee; Sumter (South Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 20 at 7:58PM EDT by NWS Columbia
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of south central Lee, northern Clarendon and central Sumter Counties through 845 PM EDT... At 758 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 9 miles north of Alcolu, or 10 miles east of South Sumter, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Sumter, Manning, South Sumter, Mulberry, Alcolu, Woods Bay State Park, Millwood, Turbeville, Mayesville, Paxville, Oswego, Brogdon, Lakewood, Privateer, Foreston, East Sumter, Gable and Shiloh. This includes Interstate 95 between mile markers 118 and 143. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
